categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Londar was a male Human who was a sergeant in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Sergeant Londar appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Hoth Equipment Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock, though he was later relabeled as the Level 38 Equipment Vendor. Another Sergeant Londar was later added as the Makeb Commendations Vendor, but is a Twi'lek. The Human Londar was later removed from the game along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Commendations vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
